## Descrição
(Descreva o PR)

## Tipo
- [ ] fix
- [ ] feat
- [ ] chore
- [ ] docs
- [ ] security

## Checklist
- [ ] Compila localmente
- [ ] Tests unitários passando
- [ ] Lint ok
- [ ] Scans SCA executados
- [ ] CSRF/Injection checks
- [ ] Secrets are not leaked
- [ ] SBOM attached (CycloneDX)
- [ ] Artifact signing test included (if applicable)

## Security checklist (mandatory if code changes)
- [ ] Threat model updated
- [ ] New dependencies reviewed
- [ ] New network endpoints documented
- [ ] Data flow verified
